missing.game.items.nonmovable

Class NonMovable

  • java.lang.Object
    • missing.game.items.Item
      • missing.game.items.nonmovable.NonMovable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, WorldTile.TileObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Container, Interactable, NonInteractable, Shop, WorldTile.Pile

    public abstract class NonMovable
extends Item
    This class provides skeleton implementation of items which cannot be moved by the player throughout the game world. It represents objects which is mainly used for aesthetic purposes of the game world and may be beneficial for the player.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
